Uses of Class
org.opensextant.geodesy.Topocentric3DPoint

Packages that use Topocentric3DPoint
Package
Description
org.opensextant.geodesy
An API for working with Geographical coordinates.

  • Uses of Topocentric3DPoint in org.opensextant.geodesy

    Methods in org.opensextant.geodesy that return Topocentric3DPoint
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Topocentric3DPoint
    FrameOfReference.toTopocentric(GeoPoint gp)
    This method is the public conversion method for using this FrameOfReference to convert any GeoPoint object into a Topocentric3DPoint.
    @NotNull Topocentric3DPoint
    Topocentric2DPoint.toTopocentric3D()
    This method converts this Topocentric2DPoint to a Topocentric3DPoint, by assuming an elevation (z-axis) value of zero meters from the Topographic point of origin.
    Methods in org.opensextant.geodesy with parameters of type Topocentric3DPoint
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Topocentric3DPoint.equals(Topocentric3DPoint that)
    This method is used to test whether two points are equal in the sense that have the same coordinate value.
